node.statement: Differentiate under the integral sign: d/dt D(rho(t)||tau(t)) = ∫₀^∞ [d/dt E_gamma(rho(t)||tau(t))] / [gamma(1 + d_A gamma)] d gamma. The exchange of d/dt and ∫ d gamma is justified by dominated convergence: |d/dt E_gamma| ≤ ||delta_AB||_1 + gamma ||1_A ⊗ delta_B||_1 which is integrable against [gamma(1+d_A gamma)]^{-1} on (0,d_A].
